name: @pkgjs/action
description: Github Actions tooling for testing Node.js packages

scripts.test: for PRIVATE_ACTION in .github/actions/*/; do cd ${INIT_CWD}/${PRIVATE_ACTION} && npm test || exit 1; done && cd ${INIT_CWD} && npm run lint
scripts.version: sed -i.bak "s/\(uses: pkgjs\/action.*\)\(@.*\)$/\1@v$npm_package_version/g" .github/workflows/node-test.yaml; rm .github/workflows/node-test.yaml.bak; git diff; git add .github/workflows/node-test.yaml

author: @pkgjs
